equation:
\begin{equation}
\begin{gathered}
   J^1\wedge J^2\wedge J^2 
      = J^1\wedge J^3\wedge J^3
      = \tfrac{1}{3}J^1\wedge J^1\wedge J^1 , \\
   J^2\wedge J^3\wedge J^3
      = J^2\wedge J^1\wedge J^1
      = \tfrac{1}{3}J^2\wedge J^2\wedge J^2 , \\
   J^3\wedge J^1\wedge J^1
      = J^3\wedge J^2\wedge J^2
      = \tfrac{1}{3}J^3\wedge J^3\wedge J^3 , \\
   J^1\wedge J^2\wedge J^3 =0 .
\end{gathered}
\

\begin{equation}
\begin{aligned}
   \Psi^{(1)} &= \vol + \vol' - J^1 \wedge J'{}^1 + J^2 \wedge J'{}^2
      + J^3 \wedge J'{}^3 , \\
   \Psi^{(2)} &= \vol + \vol' + J^1 \wedge J'{}^1 - J^2 \wedge J'{}^2
      + J^3 \wedge J'{}^3 , \\
   \Psi^{(3)} &= \vol + \vol' + J^1 \wedge J'{}^1 + J^2 \wedge J'{}^2
      - J^3 \wedge J'{}^3 , \\
   \Psi^{(4)} &= \vol + \vol' - J^1 \wedge J'{}^1 - J^2 \wedge J'{}^2
      - J^3 \wedge J'{}^3 .
\end{aligned}
\

\begin{equation}
\begin{gathered}
   J^1\wedge J^2\wedge J^2 
      = J^1\wedge J^3\wedge J^3
      = \tfrac{1}{3}J^1\wedge J^1\wedge J^1 , \\
   J^2\wedge J^3\wedge J^3
      = J^2\wedge J^1\wedge J^1
      = \tfrac{1}{3}J^2\wedge J^2\wedge J^2 , \\
   J^3\wedge J^1\wedge J^1
      = J^3\wedge J^2\wedge J^2
      = \tfrac{1}{3}J^3\wedge J^3\wedge J^3 , \\
   J^1\wedge J^2\wedge J^3 =0 .
\end{gathered}
\

\begin{equation}
\begin{aligned}
   \Psi^{(1)} &= \vol + \vol' - J^1 \wedge J'{}^1 + J^2 \wedge J'{}^2
      + J^3 \wedge J'{}^3 , \\
   \Psi^{(2)} &= \vol + \vol' + J^1 \wedge J'{}^1 - J^2 \wedge J'{}^2
      + J^3 \wedge J'{}^3 , \\
   \Psi^{(3)} &= \vol + \vol' + J^1 \wedge J'{}^1 + J^2 \wedge J'{}^2
      - J^3 \wedge J'{}^3 , \\
   \Psi^{(4)} &= \vol + \vol' - J^1 \wedge J'{}^1 - J^2 \wedge J'{}^2
      - J^3 \wedge J'{}^3 .
\end{aligned}
\
